# Name Bank
{{ bank.name }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Bank } from 'src/app/models'; import { BankService } from 'src/app/services'; @Component({ selector: 'app-bank-list', templateUrl: '../bank-list/bank-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./bank-list.component.css'], }) export class BankListComponent implements OnInit { banks: Bank[] = []; constructor(private bankService: BankService) {} ngOnInit() { this.bankService.getAll().subscribe((data?: Bank[]) => { this.banks = data || []; }); } }
